title: Fishing on the coast of Japan
creator_credit: Julien Bryan and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Depicts the rigorous existence of Japanese fisherman. This film is non-narrated with Japanese music serving as the background. Shows the preparation of the nets, men and women pulling the boats into the sea, look outs for fish, the final catch, return home and the unloading. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
